projects.title: DevPro
projects.description: A responsive and with a modern design page, where you can buy tickets to online classes. Here I made the Front-end only.

projects.title: Wallet
projects.description: Experience financial control like never before with our mobile web app designed to effortlessly manage your cash flow. Say goodbye to financial stress as you gain real-time insights into your income and expenses, all in one place. Streamline your finances, make informed decisions, and take charge of your financial future with ease.

projects.title: Robot vs Ninja
projects.description: Want to play fun and short game? You can eliminate the ninjas using a robot with massive destruction weapons. Make the highest score and compare it globally. User arrows and space bar to play.
